caption.center: James ENLOW, Nora Enlow and Nadine Bowman v. James B. POUNDERS, et ux.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Chancery Court, Tishomingo County; George F. Adams, Chancellor.
opinion.attorneys:
J. Barry Finch, Finch Finch, Iuka, for appellant.
Harold S. Jackson, Iuka, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before DAN M. LEE, P.J., and ROBERTSON and ZUCCARO, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
ROY NOBLE LEE, C.J., HAWKINS, P.J., and PRATHER, SULLIVAN, ANDERSON and GRIFFIN, JJ., concur.Page 86
